MY 1918.1, A minor operation was undertaken by us to-day to improve our positions in AVELUY I00Do It is reported that our troops have gained their objectives and that the operation was in all respects successful. Details of the amount of ground gained and prisoners captured are not yet available,20 On the rest of the front there is no changec-ne person ofGeneral Staff,War Office, S.W.1. 10th may, 1918,Issued at 6o30 p.mt1 p* CS A^fu
